org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample

Class AbstractEntityApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vaadin.Application
      • org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainersample.AbstractEntityApplication
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.vaadin.terminal.Terminal.ErrorListener, com.vaadin.terminal.URIHandler, com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntityCustomFilteringApplication, EntityParameterizedFilteringApplication, EntitySimpleFilteringApplication

    public abstract class AbstractEntityApplication
extends com.vaadin.Application
implements com.vaadin.ui.Button.ClickListener
    Shared core for applications demonstrating the CriteriaContainer features. (Lazy Query Container extended to work with JPA 2.0 queries returning a single entity type).
    Author:
    Tommi S.E. Laukkanen, Modified by Jean-Fran√ßois Lamy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
